title: EastEnders' Max Bowden says Christmas will be 'heart-wrenching' as Sheanu exposed
text:

EastEnders ' star Max Bowden is confident that the Christmas storylines for the soap will be "heart-wrenching".

The actor, who picked up 'Best Bad Boy' at the Inside Soap Awards for his turn as Ben Mitchell, teased his part in a possible 'Sheanu' reveal.

Theories are already swirling that Ben will expose his step-mum Sharon Mitchell's affair with Keanu Taylor and viewers will be set for one "explosive" festive season.

He told Mirror TV on the red carpet at the award ceremony: "All I'm gonna say is it's gonna be one of the most amazing Christmases in many years.

"It's explosive and heart-wrenching. Some of the performances are outstanding. "

(Image: Getty Images)

He continued: "Everyone is quite heavily involved in it that's what the great thing is Kate and Jon have done.

"All the stories are interlinking which means the dynamics and the power level is so raw and everyone is involved in some way which is great.

Will it lead to a showdown with rival Keanu?

"We'll have to wait and see," the actor teased.

"I mean they never have got on, there's jealousy there from Ben... but we'll see."

(Image: Getty Images)

(Image: BBC / Kieron McCarron)

Keanu will soon be found out after getting Sharon pregnant behind husband Phil Mitchell's back, and it'll make for an explosive festive episode of the BBC soap.

Danny Walters backed up the theory on Sheanu at the awards: "There’s a lot of involvement of Keanu and Sheanu storyline.

"And it’s been going for a while, the Sheen storyline and you see different elements to the relationship - when he’s been tied to the bed with pink fluffy handcuffs and you’ve seen him when he’s tied to a warehouse, threatened to kill him.

(Image: Getty Images)

(Image: BBC / Kieron McCarron)

"So yeah, there’s been different elements and it’s been a rollercoaster ride. But as we know, at some point it will be revealed.

"And when it does get revealed, it’s going to have such a massive impact on the Square on Keanu and Sharon and Louise and Phil and so many characters. So the repercussions are humungous."

The episode is set to be packed with twists and turns and could be as thrilling for viewers as last year's videotape reveal of Stacey and Max's affair.

(Image: BBC / Jack Barnes)

(Image: BBC / Jack Barnes)

Spoilers for next week's episodes have revealed Ben's pal Lola Pearce, the mother of his daughter Lexi, will be kidnapped.

Kheerat and brother Jags will take her as a warning to Ben, after the situation with the car.

Ben will enlist the help of Martin Fowler, who he's blackmailing after the attack on his dad Phil recently.

Martin fled with wife Stacey after she hit Phil over the head with a wrench and left him for dead.

EastEnders airs Mondays and Fridays at 8pm, and Tuesdays and Thursdays at 7:30pm on BBC One.
description: EXCLUSIVE: Speaking to Mirror Celebs at the Inside Soap Awards Max said that the festive season is going to be a rough ride
